full_summary:
### 2023 Tractor Mounted Boom Mower Tender

#### Solicitation Information

*   **Solicitation Reference Number**: WS3752929384
*   **Solicitation Title (English)**: K2D59-230294 Tractor Mounted Boom Mower
*   **Solicitation Title (French)**: K2D59-230294 Faucheuse-débroussailleuse à flèche montée sur un tracteur
*   **Publication Date**: November 30, 2022

#### Tender Overview

The Government of Canada is soliciting bids for the supply, delivery, and commissioning of a Power Take Off (PTO), hydraulically operated tractor-mounted boom mower complete with flail head for the St. Clair National Wildlife Area in Pain Court, Ontario.

#### Tender Requirements

The selected supplier must provide the following:

*   A Power Take Off (PTO), hydraulically operated tractor-mounted boom mower complete with flail head
*   All necessary supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on December 20, 2022, by 14:00 EST
*   All deliverables must be received on or before March 31, 2023

#### Contact Information

*   Mr. Mike Littlefield
*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   ds Marketing@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   (416) 772-4589

#### Tender Documentation

The tender documentation is available on Ariba Discovery at: Http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14775967?extsite=MTQ3NzU5NjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg??

The Government of Canada reserves the right to accept or reject any or all bids at its discretion.

#### Important Dates

*   December 20, 2022 - Tender closing date by 14:00 EST
*   March 31, 2023 - All deliverables must be received

The Government of Canada is an equal opportunities employer. It is committed to promoting diversity in the workplace and encourages Aboriginal Canadians and people with disabilities to apply. We thank all applicants for their interest. However, only those selected for further consideration will be contacted. Sponsorship by way of affiliation with another agency is not required.

Acquired costs for the procurement will be compliant with the Trade Agreement, specifically the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), for preferential supply of acquisition for
